HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
We wish you on this special day a happy and blessed birthday. You are not only sparkling and shining like the brightest star in this universe, but you are also inspiring so many people - including us - to strive to get better in art and as a person. We are glad you were born and we are happy to have met you and your art. Take care of your health mentally and physically, and don't forget that you always will be loved by many people who support you whatever you do. We will always root for you, no matter what your decisions may be in the future.
XOXO MisMis & Ebi
